name: Darkside (itch) (Ogxertz)
description:
Darkside Hacking is a revolutionary video game that puts you into the world of hacking. With detailed graphics, intense scenarios, and unique challenges, Darkside Hacking takes you on a high-stakes journey of digital exploration. Become the ultimate hacker and conquer the virtual world of cybersecurity. Experience the thrill and fun of being a hacker as you navigate networks, crack passwords, and protect your assets from malicious attacks. Master the art of hacking and prepare to take your skills to the next level. Play Darkside Hacking today and become the King of Cyber Security.

But remember, the game world doesn't stop when you log off. You'll need to forge your own enemies, allies, and reputation as you progress at your own pace. As a sandbox game, the ultimate level of skill is up to you. And with the addition of custom scripting, there will be even more ways to hack into machines. Plus, with the game being based on real UNIX commands, it will be easy to pick up for those with prior experience. Join the discord https://discord.gg/nSWkXVcKk5
